upload.title: Upload PDF
upload.dragDrop: or drag and drop your PDF here
upload.error: Error loading PDF. Please try again.

defaultPages.welcome: Welcome to your digital flipbook! This is an interactive book viewer built with React and Next.js.
defaultPages.content1: You can add any content you want here - text, images, or even custom React components.
defaultPages.content2: The flipbook is fully responsive and works great on mobile devices. Try swiping to turn pages!
defaultPages.content3: Click the buttons below to navigate, or click on the page numbers to jump to a specific page.
defaultPages.content4: You can customize the appearance, animation speed, shadows, and many other properties.
defaultPages.content5: Add as many pages as you need. The component will automatically handle pagination.
defaultPages.content6: Perfect for digital magazines, portfolios, catalogs, or any document you want to display beautifully.
defaultPages.content7: Enjoy creating your interactive flipbook experience!

metadata.title: FlipBook Viewer - Interactive PDF to Digital Flipbook Converter
metadata.description: Transform your PDFs into beautiful interactive digital flipbooks. Free online PDF to flipbook converter with realistic page-turning effects.
